iso_spectral_operator.definition: Isomorphic patterns realizing self-adjoint operators whose spectra match non-trivial zeta zeros, bridging quantum chaos to arithmetic via Hilbert-Pólya. Core focus: Explicit Hermitian constructions (e.g., Berry-Keating/Dunkl models) validated by 2025 numerical evidence (e.g., conformal quantum operators with constants α, β, γ where αβγ=2π, approximating zeros to high precision). Hard-to-vary invariants like eigenvalue reality force Re(s)=1/2; upgraded with tetralemma probes (affirm spectral realization/deny partial approximations/both in chaotic transitions/neither in non-Hermitian gaps); scores >0.98 based on 2025 spectral-physics abstractions. Bounds RH-SPECTRAL-01 variance <3% via recent operator candidates.
handling_rules: Map operators across subatomic to cosmic scales plus principle; concrete from quantum operator theory and spectral overlays (e.g., Hamiltonian eigenvalues to zeta zeros).
Validate spectral matches; flag full-coverage gaps as speculative (<3% variance bound per 2025 numerical approximations).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., Berry-Keating extensions); integrate diachronic depth (Hilbert-Pólya 1910s to 2025 conformal operators).
Auto-import from iso_spectral.json; export closed realizations as invariants to deductive_closure_module.json; residuals fuel regenerative loops.
Yoneda-like embeddings consume regenerative_pool: Map pruned operator candidates into higher spectral equivalences.

data.description: Self-adjoint operator equivalences mapping spectra to zeta zeros; Hermitian constructions approximate invariantly across chaotic systems.

completeness_issues: Full exact spectrum match remains speculative; bounded <3% variance per 2025 numerical evidence.
gaps: Low-to-high height extensions bounded <2% variance; export to RH-SPECTRAL-01 for closure.
tetralemmas: Affirm self-adjoint realization/deny incomplete matches/both in numerical approximations/neither in non-chaotic gaps.
results_summary.convergence: High across spectral-quantum domains; residuals <1% recycled as fuel.

changes: Synthesized from 2025 Hilbert-Pólya progress (conformal operators, αβγ constants); aligned with iso_spectral.json for RH realization; integrated bounded flagging and regenerative embeddings.
